technologies.name: Adobe Experience Manager
technologies.description: Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) is a content management solution for building websites, mobile apps and forms.

technologies.name: Apple iCloud Mail
technologies.description: Apple iCloud Mail is a webmail service provided by Apple, Inc.

technologies.name: Java
technologies.description: Java is a class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

technologies.name: Adobe Client Data Layer
technologies.description: Adobe Client Data Layer is a framework of JavaScript objects on your site that contains all variable values used in your implementation.

technologies.name: jQuery UI
technologies.description: jQuery UI is a collection of GUI widgets, animated visual effects, and themes implemented with jQuery, Cascading Style Sheets, and HTML.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Adobe Experience Platform Launch
technologies.description: Adobe Experience Cloud Launch is an extendable tag management solution for Adobe Experience Cloud, Adobe Experience Platform, and other applications.

technologies.name: Adobe Experience Platform Identity Service
technologies.description: Adobe Experience Platform Identity Service creates identity graphs that hold customer profiles and the known identifiers that belong to individual consumers.

technologies.name: Priority Hints
technologies.description: Priority Hints exposes a mechanism for developers to signal a relative priority for browsers to consider when fetching resources.

technologies.name: Kaltura
technologies.description: Kaltura is a video content management platform that allows users to upload, manage, share, publish, and stream videos.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: DocuSign
technologies.description: DocuSign allows organisations to manage electronic agreements.
